Included Medicine

Corel VideoStudio is an excellent tool to convert your video cameras and systems
video capture into exciting movies. The interface is intuitive and well designed, with views
editing panel full of useful and helpful.

Corel VideoStudio comes with more than 100 kinds of transition effects, each with its controls
own to change the effect speed, direction and edge.

You can easily add narration, animated titles and credits to your movie trailers. Mode
Voice and Music "to add background music recording with a mic or music CD.

It also allows you to preview your work before proceeding to burn.

The program is multilingual, no problems with languages.
